subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Heavily favored Banrock outran long shot Pennington at Saratoga Race Course to win the $110,000 West Point Stakes for 3-year-olds and upward bred in New York.
snippet: Heavily favored Banrock outran long shot Pennington at Saratoga Race Course to win the $110,000 West Point Stakes for 3-year-olds and upward bred in New York.
